bibl.title: "Argeione" in the Hesiodic Catalog and Antimachos.
bibl.note: "Klutos Argeione" in Hes. fr. 217, P. Oxy. XXVIII, 2489 (= Pack2 533e) refers to Argeia, the wife of Polyneikes, and is to be connected with fr. 192 and probably 193, P.S.I. II, 131 (= Pack2 531). "Klutos" Ar[geione" in fr. 165, P. Oxy. XI, 1359, fr. 1(= Pack2 525) seems also to be Argeia, here as mother of Thersandros.
bibl.seg: Beck William A., "Argeione" in the Hesiodic Catalog and Antimachos.

"Klutos Argeione" in Hes. fr. 217, P. Oxy. XXVIII, 2489 (= Pack2 533e) refers to Argeia, the wife of Polyneikes, and is to be connected with fr. 192 and probably 193, P.S.I. II, 131 (= Pack2 531). "Klutos" Ar[geione" in fr. 165, P. Oxy. XI, 1359, fr. 1(= Pack2 525) seems also to be Argeia, here as mother of Thersandros.
